values: Hey... wazza? I ahven't written in a long time SORRY :-( Well its like the 7th day of Spring Break and so far I've done nothing interestng. The most I've done was I went fishing on the Danie Pier and I also went to the Hard Rock Hptel yesterday with my brother and his g/f to go swimming. Ummm I've been talking to Kris a lot more lately and I hope me and him can chill one of these days cuz I really miss him. I miss basically everyone that goes to South Broward (SO DON'T WORRY I AINT FORGET ABOUT YOU GUYZ, AND I HOPE YOU AINT FORGET BOUT ME!!!)Ummm I was gonna chill wit Theresa yesterday for like maybe da last time since she switching skools, but it aint happen cuz I couldn't get a hold of her at the time I needed to so maybe another day. Well I really have nothing much to talk about so I am going to watch FAT ALBERT and THE SPONGEBOB SQUAREPANTS MOVIE!!! lol peace out mwahz

Hey so yea I went to the fair tonite. It was ok. I got to see Lesly Mell and Maegan so it was koo. I was a lil pissed off, cuz like yea I aint gonna say who but I lost a friend. (And if your reading this ... I'm sorry even though I dunno what I did. I just want you to know that I hope I can make up w/e I did cuz I dun wanna loose ya. I was thinkin bout you all nite at the fair, and like I saw someone who reminded me of ya soooooo much. It was krazii!!!) But yea w/e the nite is over and Imma pass out cuz I just took NiteQuil and that shyt knocks me out. Well I think Imma sleep now.
xoxo mwhaz ~1
- Mandi

p.s - I will always love you
       and be here for you!

Ey wats good? I'm bored as hell once again ... oh and I'm sick again too!! I dunno I guess I didn't loose my cold from last week cuz I still have one hell of a cough and I had a fever last nite. So I didn't get to go surfing today with Deja and Baez cuz it was totally flat. Like I mean 5mph winds which suck so yea we didn't go, so maybe next week.Ummm I might go to the fair tonite with Paige ... but Paige might be goin to Andrews so I might go to the fair and chill wit my jew (Maegan) or wit Lesly Kim n Mell. 
      So yesterday we played against Piper and we lost 10-6 ... I blame myself. I let 3 runs in because I messed up and went to 2nd base when I was suppose to go to 2nd. But oh well everyone did sumthin wrong.
      So yea I'm bored so Imma go watch 'Without A Paddle'. I'll holla at u all lata.

        xoxoxoxoxoxox mwahz ~1 
                - Mandi

Hey wazza .. nada much here I'm bored. So yea I didn't go to softball practice today cuz I wasn't feeling good after school and because Heather and Paige weren't going so it wouldn't of been fun. (Ha ha Tiffany got caught and now both Megan and Jen no that Tiff likes Megan.)So this weekend I am most likely going surfing with Deja, Baez and Paige might come. If Paige doesn't go then me and her are chilling at the movies I think. 
     Ummmm nothing much has been going on with me and my love life ... I still like Gabriel but it sux cuz he got suspended cuz he got in a fight for no damn reason. Ummm I am also crushiin on other people, and they no who they are. Theresa is suppose to give me a makeover one of these days, so  I can look prettyful and yea maybe change.
    Well I gotta go do HW so I will get bak to this journal thingy tomorro after our game. I hope we win!!!!
                                xoxox mwahz ~1
                          -Mandi

Hey wazza. Its like the time softball was supposing to be ending but I really didn't feel good after and school and it rained so I didn't go. I heard Pam was bitching at me for not being thurr but w/e. So today at school it was kind of boring but I mean I had the opportunity not to go but I would of gotten really bored at home and I wanted to see everyone. So like I dunno latel I have been sick and coughing like crazy. I just need to relax and try and get better/ So tomorrow we play against Piper and hpoefully its as good as our game against Miramar which we won 15-0. Ummmm I really have nothing much more to say. Sorry if my journal is boring but I dunno.
        Lmao leave comments on how gay this is ....
           xoxox mwahz ~1

Hey wazza this is my new journal thingy. Silvina told me to make one so I figured what the hell. Well its a 4 day weekend and I am sick like usual. I dunno wtf is wrong with me, i always get sick when we have days off school. So yuh anyways ... softball started at skool and I'm on varsity as long wit like Paige, Heather, KAci, Tiffany, Prisy, umm n like everyone else.Umm we won 1 game n lost 2. We beat Ely cuz they are an all black skool and you no them black people are scared of the balls (no offense to any of my black friends). But we lost to St.Thomas cuz they #1 in da state and we lost to Cypress Bay cuz them girls were freakin huge. Well yuh I dunno wat else to say and I'm gettin kinda tired so Imma go to sleep. Ummmm yea write comments about my thingy if u wanna. 
                Peace out xoxoxo mwahz ~1

p.s - paige rox my sox
